# CAM::STOP_CINEMATIC_SHOT

## Summary
Stops and deletes the current shot

## Parameters
* **SHOT_TYPE** shot

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Only used once in carsteal3 with p0 set to -1096069633 (CAMERA_MAN_SHOT)
